code: import*as React from"react";import"styles/animate.scss";import{useSelectTransaction}from"providers/transactions/selected";export function TransactionSquare(_ref){var transaction=_ref.transaction;var status=transaction.status,details=transaction.details;var selectTransaction=useSelectTransaction();var statusClass="";if(transaction.status==="success"){statusClass="primary";}else if(status==="timeout"){statusClass="danger";}else{statusClass="dark";}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{onClick:function onClick(){return selectTransaction(details.signature);},className:"btn d-flex flex-column justify-content-center align-items-center square slideInRight btn-".concat(statusClass)});}
